data.name: PageTitle
data.comment: Page title for extensions and apps

data.name: PageDescription
data.value: Install browser extensions and mobile apps to access your vault from all your devices and automatically fill credentials on websites.
data.comment: Page description for extensions and apps

data.name: BreadcrumbTitle
data.comment: Breadcrumb title for extensions and apps

data.name: BrowserExtensionsDescription
data.value: The AliasVault browser extension allows you to autofill existing credentials on any website. It also allows you to generate new aliases during registration, access received emails on all of your aliases, and view your aliases and identities.

data.name: ComingSoonText
data.comment: Coming soon text for unavailable extensions

data.name: MobileAppsDescription
data.value: The AliasVault mobile app allows you to access your aliases and identities on the go, view and manage received emails, and generate new aliases anytime. Your data is fully protected with on-device biometric authentication.
